javadoc: Monitor object returned from a GTimer.schedule() call

methods.javadoc:
Cancels the scheduled runnable associated with this GTimerMonitor if it has not already run.
@return true if the scheduled runnable was cancelled before it had a chance to execute.
methods.name: cancel
methods.comment: Cancels the scheduled runnable associated with this GTimerMonitor if it has not already run.

return.comment: true if the scheduled runnable was cancelled before it had a chance to execute.

methods.javadoc:
Return true if the scheduled runnable has completed.
@return true if the scheduled runnable has completed.
methods.name: didRun
methods.comment: Return true if the scheduled runnable has completed.

return.comment: true if the scheduled runnable has completed.

methods.javadoc:
Return true if the scheduled runnable was cancelled before it had a chance to run.
@return
methods.name: wasCancelled
methods.comment: Return true if the scheduled runnable was cancelled before it had a chance to run.

name: GTimerMonitor
comment: Monitor object returned from a GTimer.schedule() call
